title: Lido and Liquid Staking
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Lido and Liquid Staking.

hook.text: Staking Ethereum locks your coins. Lido created a way to stake and still use your money at the same time.

buildup.text: When you stake through Lido, you receive stETH â€” a token representing your staked Ether that earns rewards.

discovery.text: You can use stETH in DeFi â€” lend it, borrow against it, or trade it â€” while still earning staking rewards.

twist.text: Lido grew so dominant it controlled over 30% of all staked Ethereum. A single protocol with that much power is risky.

climax.text: Liquid staking unlocked billions in frozen capital. It also concentrated power in a way Ethereum wasn't designed for.

punchline.text: Stake your coins and spend them too. DeFi broke the rules of locking up.

quiz.question: What does liquid staking allow users to do?
options: Stake crypto and still use it in DeFi through a derivative token
